alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 05 at 4:37PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Snow showers to continue into the evening across northeast Nye and east-central White Pine counties... An area of snow showers will continue to affect portions of northeast Nye and east-central White Pine counties through the evening. National Weather Service observers, Nevada Department of transportation webcams, and automated weather observing platforms are showing light snow across portions of US Highway 6, 50, and 93 across the above areas. Some locations may temporarily see moderate to heavy snow with rates of one inch an hour along with a visibility of one more or less. Cities and towns within this area include Duckwater, Blue Eagle Ranch, Ely, Ruth, McGill, Great Basin National Park, and Baker. The system will gradually work its way east and out of the area, with snow diminishing from west to east. Accumulations of one to three inches can be expected. If driving this afternoon, please use caution as roadways could be snow covered and slippery. Reduce speed and use low beams to arrive at your destination safely. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; White Pine County
